name: Avoid using double quote for long strings without variables (PHP)
description: This rule searches all the Methods, Functions and PHP sections having string with double quotes and without an variable.
output:
This report lists all the Methods, Functions and PHP Sections containing strings with double quotes and without any variable.
This QR provides the following information:
Methods, Functions and PHP Sections full name.
rationale: For the strings using double quotes PHP do some extra processing in order to detect if the string contains any variables.So in this case, echo ‘This is long string’ . $name is faster then echo “This is long string $name”. Concatenation with single quotes is faster and   for example for echo ‘This is long string’ , $name, is faster because it does not require any string manipulation.So always prefer single quotes for the strings if you do not use variable in your string.
remediation: Try to reduce the number of string having double quotes and replace them by strings with simple quotes.
remediationSample:
<?php
$variable='This variable contains a  long string. that is way it is better to use simple quote'; //Violation removed

?>
